column2: summ_funs <- summ(funs, caption = 'Summary of Descriptive Statistics Functions')

Summary of Descriptive Statistics Functions
Function Output Example
mean(x) vector mean(mtcars\$mpg)
median(x) vector median(mtcars\$mpg)
min(x) vector min(mtcars\$mpg)
max(x) vector max(mtcars\$mpg)
nrow(x)/NROW(x) vector nrow(mtcars); NROW(mtcars)
ncol(x)/NCOL(x) vector ncol(mtcars); NCOL(mtcars)
dim(x) vector dim(mtcars)
summary(x) summary class summary(mtcars)
